mapper.select:
usp_execute_sql_prod 'select top 10000 ID ChangeID,InsertTime ChangeTime,OperateTime,RoomTypeID,RatePlanID as RateplanID,HotelID HotelCode,BeginDate StartDate,EndDate,IsEffective Status,GenSalePrice Member, WeekendSalePrice Weekend,GenSaleCost MemberCost,WeekendSaleCost WeekendCost,CASE WHEN AllowAddBed=1 THEN AddBedPrice ELSE -1 END AddBed,CurrencyCode,PriceID from dbo.PriceInfo_LastChange PriceInfo_track
and datatype=0
and InsertTime > ''${InsertTime}''
and Id > ${Id}
order by Id'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select a.*,b.proxy ProxyId from ( select top 10000 ID IncrId, InsertTime ChangeTime, reser_no OrderId, reser_status Status, arrive_date ArrivalDate, leave_date DepartureDate, sum_price TotalPrice, num_room NumberOfRooms, card_no CardNo, order_from OrderFrom from reserve_track
and reser_status in('N','A','F','C','Z','D','B','O','G','U','H','B1','B2','B3','S')
and InsertTime > ''${InsertTime}''
and Id > ${Id}
order by Id ) a inner join member b on a.CardNo = b.card_no'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY op_date) RowNumber, 1 StateType ,hotel_id HotelId ,NULL HotelCode ,NULL RoomId ,NULL RoomTypeId ,NULL RatePlanId ,case hotel_status when 0 then 1 else 0 end Status ,op_date ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime ,hotel_name as Name from MHotelBase
and op_date >= ''${startTime}''
and op_date <= ''${endTime}''
) t'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY s.op_date) RowNumber, 2 StateType ,ms.MHotelID HotelId ,hotel_id HotelCode ,NULL RoomId ,NULL RoomTypeId ,NULL RatePlanId ,case isreserve when 0 then 1 else 0 end Status ,op_date ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime from Hotel s inner join mhotelshotelrelation ms on s.hotel_id=ms.SHotelID
and s.op_date >= ''${startTime}''
and s.op_date <= ''${endTime}''
) t'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY op_date) RowNumber, 3 StateType ,notes HotelId ,NULL HotelCode ,room_type_id RoomId ,NULL RoomTypeId ,NULL RatePlanId ,available Status ,op_date ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime ,room_type as Name from MRoom_type_num
and op_date >= ''${startTime}''
and op_date <= ''${endTime}''
) t'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY s.op_date) RowNumber, 4 StateType ,ms.MHotelID HotelId ,s.notes HotelCode ,s.mroom_type_id RoomId ,s.room_type_id RoomTypeId ,NULL RatePlanId ,available Status ,op_date ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime from Room_Type_Num s inner join mhotelshotelrelation ms on s.notes=ms.SHotelID
and op_date >= ''${startTime}''
and op_date <= ''${endTime}''
) t'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY s.operateTime) RowNumber, 5 StateType ,ms.MHotelID HotelId ,s.hotelId HotelCode ,NULL RoomId ,NULL RoomTypeId ,s.RatePlanId RatePlanId ,s.status Status ,s.operateTime ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime ,CNRatePlanName as Name from RatePlan s inner join mhotelshotelrelation ms on s.hotelId=ms.SHotelID
and s.operateTime >= ''${startTime}''
and s.operateTime <= ''${endTime}''
) t'

usp_execute_sql_prod 'select count(1) from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY s.operateTime) RowNumber, 6 StateType ,ms.MHotelID HotelId ,s.hotelId HotelCode ,NULL RoomId ,NULL RoomTypeId ,s.RatePlanId RatePlanId ,NULL Status ,s.operateTime ChangeTime ,getdate() as InsertTime from RateplanRelationPolicy s inner join mhotelshotelrelation ms on s.hotelId=ms.SHotelID
and s.operateTime >= ''${startTime}''
and s.operateTime <= ''${endTime}''
) t'
